snippet: Thomas Woodrow Price, headmaster of Branson School in Marin County, Calif., was found with heroine, cocaine and enough methamphetamine for the pair to be accused of possession of that drug for sale.
abstract: Branson School, prestigious prep school in affluent Marin County community Ross, Calif, is thrust into damage control mode after arrest of headmaster Thomas Woodrow Price on felony drug charges.
lead_paragraph: Thomas Woodrow Price, headmaster of Branson School in Marin County, Calif., was found with heroine, cocaine and enough methamphetamine for the pair to be accused of possession of that drug for sale.

headline.main: California Prep School Shaken by Arrests of Headmaster and Woman, 21, on Drug Charges
headline.print_headline: Prep School Shaken by Arrest of Headmaster With a Woman, 21, on Drug Charges
